name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2017
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2017 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite professional basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/Win7/Win8.X/Win10 Processor: Intel or AMD, 32 bit or 64 bit Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
